title: A  INTRODUCTION TO OUR SERVICES
Purpose: This section outlines the agreement governing the user's use of Apple's services and specifies hardware and software requirements.

title: B  USING OUR SERVICES
Purpose: This section details the payment processes, responsibilities, and refund policies related to transactions made through the services.

title: 27  PRIVACY
Purpose: This section states that the use of Apple's services is subject to the company's privacy policy.

title: 29  SERVICES AND CONTENT USAGE RULES
Purpose: This section establishes the rules users must follow when using the services and content, as well as the consequences for non-compliance.

title: 57  DOWNLOADS
Purpose: This section explains the limitations and conditions regarding downloading content from Apple's services.

title: 61  SUBSCRIPTIONS
Purpose: This section outlines the terms related to purchasing and managing subscriptions for services offered by Apple.

title: 66  CONTENT AND SERVICE AVAILABILITY
Purpose: This section states that terms related to services and content not available in a user's home country do not apply to them.

title: 68  THIRD-PARTY DEVICES AND EQUIPMENT
Purpose: This section clarifies the compatibility of the services with non-Apple devices and equipment.

title: 70  YOUR SUBMISSIONS TO OUR SERVICES
Purpose: This section explains the user’s rights and responsibilities regarding materials submitted to Apple's services.

title: 82  D  FAMILY SHARING
Purpose: This section describes the Family Sharing feature and its requirements for sharing subscriptions among family members.

title: 86  E  SERIES PASS AND MULTI-PASS
Purpose: This section explains the terms of purchasing and accessing television content through Series Pass and Multi-Pass.

title: 90  F  ADDITIONAL APP STORE TERMS (EXCLUDING APPLE ARCADE APPS)
Purpose: This section covers additional terms related to the use of the App Store, excluding Apple Arcade apps.

title: 128  I  ADDITIONAL APPLE FITNESS+ TERMS
Purpose: This section states that Apple Fitness+ is for entertainment purposes only and not intended as medical advice.

title: 130  J  CARRIER MEMBERSHIP
Purpose: This section outlines the terms regarding purchasing service memberships from wireless carriers.

title: 141  CONTRACT CHANGES
Purpose: This section explains Apple's right to modify the terms of the agreement and notify the user of such changes.

title: 145  INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
Purpose: This section affirms Apple’s ownership of proprietary information and materials and restricts their use.

title: 165  TERMINATION AND SUSPENSION OF SERVICES
Purpose: This section details the circumstances under which Apple can terminate services or user accounts.

title: DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES; LIABILITY LIMITATIONS
Purpose: This section outlines Apple's limitations of liability and disclaimers regarding the services provided.

title: STATUTORY EXCEPTIONS FOR PUBLIC INSTITUTIONS
Purpose: This section specifies the legal exceptions applicable to qualified public educational or government institutions.

title: GOVERNING LAW
Purpose: This section describes the governing laws and jurisdiction applicable to the agreement between the user and Apple.

title: OTHER PROVISIONS
Purpose: This section includes additional legal provisions that govern the agreement and the use of services.
